== Vazhayur (CT) (627466) ==

Vazhayur (CT) is a town in the [[Ernad]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 23.78 sq. km. and harbouring 7883 households with total population of 36909 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 400 km. Male population is 18163 and female population is 18746. Scheduled Caste population is 4555 and Scheduled Tribes population is 104. Census Location Code of the town is 627466<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 21 km. Railway station is at Feroke at a distance of 12 km.
